channel.title: Project Fatality Returns - Full Summoning / Fullscreen
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/4q0eo6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/wklfk3.gif[/img] This is the project I'm doing on learning purpose.[/CENTER] [b][size=18pt]Introduction[/SIZE][/b] It's my second attempt on Project Fatality. I hope this one will go to the end. My goal is to create a good server with perfect skills & minigames and to learn to improve my java. [b][size=18pt]The Base[/SIZE][/b] For base source I chose is PI. [b]Update Log[/b] [color=green][b] [ul][li]September 1st -> September 22th[/li] [li]Added Donator island[/li] [li]Added Donator Status + Crown[/li] [li]Fixed All The Teleports[/li] [li]Added Skill Capes Emotes[/li] [li]Custom Nazi Zombie Minigame[/li] [li]Added Mole / Sea Queen / Khalphite Queen 100%[/li] [li]Fixed NPC Drops[/li] [li]Added GWD[/li] [li]GWD 100%[/li] [li]Added full 100% Farming close to rs[/li] [li]January 1st -> February 10th[/li] [li]NPC VS NPC 100%[/li] [li]All new Runescape Items loading through cache (i.e no hardcoded stuff)[/li] [li]All new Runescape anims & Gfxs[/li] [li]Fullscreen Client[/li] [li]Full Summoning with BOB storage like real rs[/li] [li]Summoning Npcs helping in PVP and also against other NPCS[/li] [li]New Quests Weekly.[/li][/ul] [b]Proof of Fullscreen/ New Items/ Summoning[/b] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/1402/15203482.png[/img] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/1745/34667278.png[/img] [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/8623/picts3.png[/img] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/8721/pict2t.png[/img] [b]Project Fatality Content[/b]
Key: Not Started In Progress Finished
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/348r42h.png[/img]
[ul][*]Uptime 24/7 [*]Offer both competitive and fun gameplay for the players [*]An economy that does not lose purpose within a few weeks of the server being released [*]Weekly updates to the server as well as patching of bugs found by our players [*]New Quests Every Week [*]Get close to perfect GWD like RS (Done) [*]Build Brimhaven Dungeon with fully working things [*]Full Summoning with Interfaces [*]Full Grand Exchange [*]Dungeneering skill (in progress atm) [*]All New Dungeneeing maps[/ul]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/sq2yqs.png[/img]
To Do [quote]Skills Agility So far: Gnome Agility Course Added To do: Fully add Brimhaven Dungeon __________________________________________________ Fishing So far: Fishes all fish with requirements To do: Add all emotes and proper timers. __________________________________________________ Firemaking So far: Gives Xp and does emote. To do: Create a fire that goes out and creates ashes. __________________________________________________ Dungeneering So far: Fishes all fish with requirements To do: Add all emotes and proper timers. [/quote] [quote]Minigames Pest Control Barrows Duel Arena [color=red]Castle Wars[/color] Fight Caves Fight Pits [/quote] [quote]God Wars Dungeon All 4 Bosses added All Boss + gwd npc emotes added 100% Working Kc with all Npcs Working Kc interface for all bosses Range Needed for Arma Npcs Working Boss Doors with 20 kc needed. Fixed Noclip into the Boss Chamber Added Working prayer altar Full Gwd Npc Drops [/quote] [quote]New Bosses Bulwark beast: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Hobgoblin Geomancer: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Night-gazer Khighorahk: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Sagittare: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Rammernaut: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Lexicus Runewright: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Har'Lakk the Riftsplitter: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Luminescent icefiend: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Gluttonous behemoth: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Nomad: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place [/quote]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/24x06pt.png[/img]
Done [quote][size=18pt]Skills[/size] Smithing Cooking Woodcutting Farming Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Runecrafting Prayer Summoning All combat skills are trainable. [/quote] [quote][size=18pt]Full Farming and Lunar[/size] Fully working with tree patches pics inside [IMG]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/7579/lunar1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/5643/lunar3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img593.imageshack.us/img593/6642/lunar4.png[/img] [IMG]http://img573.imageshack.us/img573/4485/lunar5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/9094/lunar6.png[/img] [IMG]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/1486/lunar7.png[/img] [IMG]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/2748/lunar9.png[/img] [IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/9010/lunar10.png[/img] [IMG]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/799/lunar11.png[/img] [IMG]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/1687/lunar12.png[/img] [IMG]http://img528.imageshack.us/img528/2913/lunar13.png[/img] [IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/6713/lunar14.png[/img] [IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/7484/lunar15.png[/img] [IMG]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/2200/lunar2.png[/img] [IMG]http://img829.imageshack.us/img829/3529/trees0.png[/img] [IMG]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/1672/62196697.png[/img] [IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4313/75929669.png[/img] [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/5953/91086941.png[/img] [/quote] [quote][size=18pt]New Bosses[/size] Planefreezer: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Bal'ak the Pummler: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Unholy Cursebear: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Tormented Demon: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Corporeal Beast: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Giant Mole: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Khalphite Queen: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place Sea Queen: Added Npc Drops Emotes Place [/quote]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/k9jb87.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Pictures from newest to oldest.[/size] [img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/1402/15203482.png[/img] [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/1745/34667278.png[/img] item.title: Project Fatality Returns - Full Summoning / Fullscreen
item.dc:creator: @ProjectFatalityServe ProjectFatalityServer
item.description:
@ProjectFatalityServe wrote:

[CENTER]

This is the project I’m doing on learning purpose.[/CENTER]

[size=18pt]Introduction[/SIZE]
It’s my second attempt on Project Fatality. I hope this one will go to the end.
My goal is to create a good server with perfect skills & minigames and to learn to improve my java.

[size=18pt]The Base[/SIZE]
For base source I chose is PI.

Update Log
[color=green][b]
[ul][li]September 1st -> September 22th[/li]
[li]Added Donator island[/li]
[li]Added Donator Status + Crown[/li]
[li]Fixed All The Teleports[/li]
[li]Added Skill Capes Emotes[/li]
[li]Custom Nazi Zombie Minigame[/li]
[li]Added Mole / Sea Queen / Khalphite Queen 100%[/li]
[li]Fixed NPC Drops[/li]
[li]Added GWD[/li]
[li]GWD 100%[/li]
[li]Added full 100% Farming close to rs[/li]
[li]January 1st -> February 10th[/li]
[li]NPC VS NPC 100%[/li]
[li]All new Runescape Items loading through cache (i.e no hardcoded stuff)[/li]
[li]All new Runescape anims & Gfxs[/li]
[li]Fullscreen Client[/li]
[li]Full Summoning with BOB storage like real rs[/li]
[li]Summoning Npcs helping in PVP and also against other NPCS[/li]
[li]New Quests Weekly.[/li][/ul]

Proof of Fullscreen/ New Items/ Summoning



Project Fatality Content

Key: Not Started In Progress Finished

[ul][*]Uptime 24/7 [*]Offer both competitive and fun gameplay for the players [*]An economy that does not lose purpose within a few weeks of the server being released [*]Weekly updates to the server as well as patching of bugs found by our players [*]New Quests Every Week [*]Get close to perfect GWD like RS (Done) [*]Build Brimhaven Dungeon with fully working things [*]Full Summoning with Interfaces [*]Full Grand Exchange [*]Dungeneering skill (in progress atm) [*]All New Dungeneeing maps[/ul]

To Do [quote]Skills Agility So far: Gnome Agility Course Added To do: Fully add Brimhaven Dungeon __________________________________________________

Fishing
So far:
Fishes all fish with requirements
To do:
Add all emotes and proper timers.

Firemaking
So far:
Gives Xp and does emote.
To do:
Create a fire that goes out and creates ashes.

Dungeneering
So far:
Fishes all fish with requirements
To do:
Add all emotes and proper timers.
[/quote]

[quote]Minigames

Pest Control
Barrows
Duel Arena
[color=red]Castle Wars[/color]
Fight Caves
Fight Pits

[/quote]

[quote]God Wars Dungeon

All 4 Bosses added
All Boss + gwd npc emotes added 100%
Working Kc with all Npcs
Working Kc interface for all bosses
Range Needed for Arma Npcs
Working Boss Doors with 20 kc needed.
Fixed Noclip into the Boss Chamber
Added Working prayer altar
Full Gwd Npc Drops

[/quote]

[quote]New Bosses

Bulwark beast:
Added Npc
Drops
Emotes
Place

[/quote]

Done [quote][size=18pt]Skills[/size] Smithing Cooking Woodcutting Farming Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Runecrafting Prayer Summoning

All combat skills are trainable.

[/quote]

[quote][size=18pt]Full Farming and Lunar[/size]
Fully working with tree patches pics inside



















[/quote]

Planefreezer:
